rules.natural: If a researcher detects contamination in a water sample, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If a researcher identifies contamination in a soil sample, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If the regulator confirms the safety of the material, then the committee does not halt the research project
Either the regulator confirms the safety of the material or a third party verifies the safety of the material
If the committee requires approval for the procedure, then should a third party verify the safety of the material, the committee does not halt the research project
Either the committee grants a waiver for the regulation or the committee requires approval for the procedure
Either the team violates safety protocol or if a scientist discovers perovskite material, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If the committee conducts an audit of the laboratory, then the team does not violate safety protocol
Either the committee conducts an audit of the laboratory or the regulator performs an inspection of the facility
If the regulator performs an inspection of the facility, then the team does not violate safety protocol

Either the research institute develops solar panel technology or if the research field does not make a breakthrough in renewable energy, then the research institute receives funding from the government
If the product enters the market industry, then the technology achieves commercialization in the market
Either the technology faces opposition from competitors or if the product gains approval from the regulatory body, then the product enters the market industry
Either the material shows toxicity to the environment or the committee does not halt the research project
If the material passes standardized testing, then the material does not show toxicity to the environment
If the laboratory completes analysis of the material, then the material passes standardized testing
Either the laboratory completes analysis of the material or the consultant submits a report of findings
If the consultant submits a report of findings, then the material passes standardized testing
If the material causes concern due to its properties, then the material demonstrates hazardous characteristics
If the material demonstrates hazardous characteristics, then the material poses risk in its application
If the material demonstrates hazardous characteristics, then the material does not pose risk in its application
If a scientist discovers perovskite material, then the scientist publishes a paper in a scientific journal
Either a scientist discovers perovskite material or the research institute develops wind turbine technology
If the research institute develops wind turbine technology, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If the scientist publishes a paper in a scientific journal, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If the research institute secures a patent for battery design, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
Either the research institute secures a patent for battery design or the research institute forms a partnership with a tech corporation
If the research institute forms a partnership with a tech corporation, then the product gains approval from the regulatory body
If the research institute forms a partnership with a tech corporation, then the manufacturer scales production of the technology
If the technology achieves commercialization in the market, then the research field makes a breakthrough in renewable energy
If the manufacturer scales production of the technology, then the technology achieves commercialization in the market
If neither a researcher detects contamination in a water sample nor a researcher identifies contamination in a soil sample, then the committee halts the research project
If it is not the case that when the material exhibits stability under various conditions then the committee does not halt the research project, then the material causes concern due to its properties
If the research field does not make a breakthrough in renewable energy, then the research institute does not receive funding from the government

The technology does not face opposition from competitors
